Name: New Amsterdam
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A delicately flavoured and lightly balanced genever based drink with hints of kirsch and aromatic Creole bitters.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2006 by Jim Meehan at PDT , New York City, USA. This cocktail features in Jim's 2011 The PDT Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of New Amsterdam contains 113 calories
